name: URL-Uploader
description: An url uploader bot with permenent thumbnail support

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token from @botfather, as a string.

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in mongoDB. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

DEF_THUMB_NAIL_VID_S.description: default thumbnail to be used in the videos. Incase, youtube-dl is unable to find a thumbnail.

DATABASE_URL.description: mongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: For Force Subscribe. Paste your Update channel USERNAME (without @)..
